comment1: This Setting can be useful if using Respotter as a scheduled service
comment2: This Setting can allow you to only output ipv4 or ipv6 depending on your enviroment.
comment3: This Setting can be useful if you want to change the current false DNS Name, to be more sneaky against the Responder Machine
comment4: Insert your webhookURI to get alerts when Responder is found. If you don't want alerts, leave the setting blank (Default).
comment5: Mark true if you would like your alert to have a Defender alert linked in the message card.
